title: Enemy Stat Block
description: JSON schema for enemy stat block creation responses

id.description: Unique identifier for the enemy stat block, must start with enemy_

name.description: The display name of the enemy

level.description: Enemy level (1-10), determining base difficulty to hit

description.description: Narrative flavor text and visual description of the enemy

vulnerability.description: Narrative description of the condition or method required for player hits to count as successes

badStuff.description: Narrative description of what happens if the enemy defeats the player

tags.description: Optional list of tags representing enemy abilities, resistances, or special traits
